snippet.title: Dollmare - Inspect dolls for defects and anomalies!
snippet.description:
Download the demo on itch.io https://alxgrade.itch.io/dollmare?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt You were desperate for money to pay the rent, so you've accepted a job offer at a doll factory. What seemed like a way to make an easy buck, turned out to be something much more sinister.

Why are you the only worker at the factory? Why does the director never leave his office? What happened to the previous employee? And what's wrong with these suspicious dolls?

➡️ More from Alex Grade https://alxgrade.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
